sentences.en: After the entertainment the captain obtained an entrance fee.
sentences.cn: 娱乐表演之后，船长获得了一笔入场费。

sentences.en: Animation has stopped being eye-candy for kids and geeks and become mainstream entertainment.
sentences.cn: 动画不再仅仅吸引小孩子和动漫迷的眼球，而成了主流娱乐方式。

sentences.en: Crudeness is on the rise in all fields of entertainment.
sentences.cn: 所有娱乐领域都日益粗俗化。

sentences.en: I'm an exhibitionist, and I get off on the entertainment we give people.
sentences.cn: 我这人爱出风头，能让大家高兴我就觉得很来劲儿。

sentences.en: I'm interested in working in the entertainment business.
sentences.cn: 我有兴趣在娱乐业工作.

sentences.en: My friend fails to mention the long and friendless winter evenings which are interrupted only by an occasional visit to the local cinema —— virtually the only form of entertainment.
sentences.cn: 我的朋友没提到那漫长而寂寞的隆冬寒夜,而打破这寒夜寂寞的只有偶尔去当地电影院看看电影——实际上此乃唯一的娱乐形式.

sentences.en: School brass band will provide music for entertainment.
The climax of Negro entertainment was reached in the 1930 s.
sentences.cn: 黑人剧到了20世纪30年代才发展到顶点.

sentences.en: The dolphins give good entertainment value (= a lot of amusement and interest ).
sentences.cn: 海豚具有很高的娱乐价值。

sentences.en: The entertainment at the new theater changes nightly.
sentences.cn: 那家新戏院的演出节目每晚都换.

sentences.en: The entertainment consisted of comic songs, dances and acrobatic performance, and wound up with a screamingly funny farce.
sentences.cn: 娱乐的节目包括滑稽歌曲 、 舞蹈和杂技, 最后是一场令人捧腹大笑的滑稽闹剧.

sentences.en: The hotel is famous for its entertainment.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆以殷勤待客而著称.

sentences.en: The town provides a wide choice of entertainment.
sentences.cn: 该镇提供各式各样的娱乐活动。

sentences.en: There will be live entertainment (= performed then, not recorded ) throughout the day.
sentences.cn: 现场表演将持续一整天。

sentences.en: There's something charminglyold-fashioned about his brand of entertainment.
sentences.cn: 他自成一格的表演有一种迷人的旧情调。

sentences.en: They worship dreams Holiness in art, ritual, entertainment.
sentences.cn: 他们崇拜梦,崇拜艺术 、 仪式和娱乐中的神圣.

sentences.en: What they have done is fuse two different types of entertainment, the circus and the rock concert.
sentences.cn: 他们所做的就是把马戏表演和摇滚音乐会这两种不同类型的娱乐形式糅合了起来。

sentences.en: Working with the police has turned me against the use of violent scenes as entertainment.
sentences.cn: 与警方合作后，我开始很反感把暴力场面作为娱乐表演的做法。
